timeline.message: Add newBuilder method to `ApolloClient` to be able to copy instance

timeline.body: We had other instances where we had `get`. Plus, it is nicer in Kotlin. That's why for consistency I wanted to deprecate this one.
timeline.bodyText: We had other instances where we had get. Plus, it is nicer in Kotlin. That's why for consistency I wanted to deprecate this one.
timeline.bodyHTML: We had other instances where we had get. Plus, it is nicer in Kotlin. That's why for consistency I wanted to deprecate this one.
timeline.author: tasomaniac

timeline.body:
```suggestion
    private Builder(@NotNull ApolloClient apolloClient) {
```

* private because there shouldn't be a reason to call this constructor directly instead of `newBuilder()`, right ?
* @NotNull because the IDE suggested it 🙃
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
Builder(ApolloClient apolloClient) {
private Builder(@NotNull ApolloClient apolloClient) {
  • private because there shouldn't be a reason to call this constructor directly instead of newBuilder(), right ?
